text: Thomas Francis Hurley (born August 29, 1944) is an American former ice hockey defenseman and Olympian. Hurley played with Team USA at the 1968 Winter Olympics held in Grenoble, France.https://www.hockey- reference.com/olympics/athletes/tom-hurley-1 He previously played for the Clarkson Golden Knights at Clarkson University. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Ice hockey people from New York (state) Category:Ice hockey players at the 1968 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic ice hockey players of the United States Category:People from Massena, New York Category:American men's ice hockey centers Category:Clarkson Golden Knights men's ice hockey players
title: Thomas Hurley (ice hockey)
